recipe_name: Couscous with red onion and herbs
author: Paul Rankin
method: Place the couscous into a large bowl and add hot chicken or vegetable stock. Cover and leave to stand for five minutes. In a frying pan add the vegetable oil. Once hot add the red onion.  Fry for 2-3 minutes and remove from the heat. Add the avocado, the lime juice, fresh herbs, chilli and the red onion to the couscous and mix thoroughly. Serve.
